blogPost.excerpt: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
blogPost.body: Textcraft is a magical utility for iPhone, iPad, and Mac that allows you to transform any text in real-time into a variety of 80+ different formats.
blogPost.title: Textcraft - Magic text transformations
blogPost.author: JPEGuin

localize.description: Textcraft是一款适用于iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇实用程序，允许您将任何文本实时转换为各种80多种不同的格式。
Textcraft是一款適用於iPhone、iPad和Mac的神奇實用程序，允許您將任何文本實時轉換爲各種80多種不同的格式。
